## 

**8/29/2025**

```{r}

area_of_circle <- function(radius) {
  area <- pi * radius^2
  return(area)
}
radius <- 5 
circle_area <- area_of_circle(radius)
cat("The area of the circle with radius", radius, "5", circle_area, "\n")
```
